short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser extension designed to disable the Command+Shift+I shortcut in Chrome on macOS.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Disable specific keyboard shortcuts like Command+Shift+I in Chrome on macOS for a better browsing experience.

How to Set Up After Installation:
1. After installing the extension, open the shortcuts settings page by entering the following in your browser's address bar: chrome://extensions/shortcuts
2. Locate "Shortstop" in the list and assign your preferred key combinations for each action.
